card_text: Activate 1 of these effects.$N●Special Summon 1 Level 9 monster from your hand.$N●Target 1 Level 9 monster you control; Special Summon from your Deck, 2 Level 9 monsters each with different original Type and Attribute from that face-up targeted monster, and with different names from each other, but these 2 monsters cannot attack, also destroy them during the End Phase.$NYou can only activate 1 "World Legacy Monstrosity" per turn.
